page.title: 16INDUSTRIES IN ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: In our area lies{Hillend Industrial {Estate}.There are about 50 factories but we have only 33 of them in our area.Most are electronics and light engineering.The biggest employer is {Marconi space and defence.}We have also got{Store Design }which has won an award for good business.There are two factories for making blinds,there is also a bank for the workers and it is the{Royal Bank of Scotland.Marconi has two factories in our area,they are the youth training centre and the other is called{Marconi Secure Radio {Systems Ltd.Marconi}employs roughly 3,000 workers.Most other factories are small.Some other electronics firms are,{Hillend Electronics,Bournes and {Fortronic}.The main engineering factories are{Narvida Appliances and {Normand and Thompson Ltd.
